generic_name: CADMIUM SULFATE, GRAPHITE, PHOSPHORIC ACID, SILICON DIOXIDE, SELENIUM, THALLIUM, USTILAGO MAYDIS
warnings: Warnings: If symptoms persist or worsen, or if pregnant or nursing, consult a doctor. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if cap seal is broken or missing.
dosage_administration: Dosage & Administration: Turn tube upside down, twist cap to break seal & release pellets. Using clear cap, place 3 pellets to dissolve under your tongue 3 times a day or as needed. Take apart from food or drinks. To preserve purity avoid touching pellets with fingers.
indications: Indications & Usage: Turn tube upside down, twist cap to break seal & release pellets. Using clear cap, place 3 pellets to dissolve under your tongue 3 times a day or as needed. Take apart from food or drinks. To preserve purity avoid touching pellets with fingers.
